name: KRWQ
description: KRWT is a Korean won (KRW)-denominated stablecoin designed for full-reserve, compliance-first operation. It provides 24/7, on-chain KRW settlement for remittances, B2B trade, and institutional use, reducing dependence on USD stablecoins and improving cross-border efficiency. Reserves are held 1:1 in segregated bank accounts with public attestations and proof-of-reserves. KRWT integrates native Travel-Rule compliance, on-chain allow/deny-lists, and tiered onboarding for banks, PSPs, and retail partners. It enables faster, transparent, and programmable settlement in line with Koreaâ€™s modernization goals while remaining policy-aligned, audit-ready, and interoperable with global blockchain networks.
